front.title: Updates to SIPREC correcting Metadata Media Type

abstract.t: The SIP-based Media Recording (SIPREC) protocol is defined by both Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Recording Metadata (RFC 7865) and Session Recording Protocol (RFC 7866). Unfortunately, both RFCs contradict each other regarding how recording metadata is to be labeled. In addition, neither RFCs registered the new media type. This document updates RFC 7866 to align with RFC 7865 when labeling recording metadata and registers the new media type.
